prompts.phrase: Please take a deep breath and hold it.
prompts.when_to_use: A doctor instructs a patient during a check-up, often when using a stethoscope.
prompts.prompt: A male doctor standing next to exam table with an old patient, holding a stethoscope
prompts.negative_prompt: No hospital beds, no complex medical equipment, no other doctors or patients.

prompts.phrase: The results should be ready in a few days.
prompts.when_to_use: A doctor or nurse informs a patient that test results will take time to process.
prompts.prompt: A nurse wearning modest cloths handing a document to a patient who is sitting in a hospital chair.
prompts.negative_prompt: No computers, no large medical machines, no multiple staff members.

prompts.phrase: I have a terrible headache and feel dizzy.
prompts.when_to_use: A patient describes their symptoms to a doctor or nurse.
prompts.prompt: A male patient sitting in a hospital chair, holding their forehead with a concerned look.
prompts.negative_prompt: No overly dramatic expressions, no visible injuries, no complex backgrounds.

prompts.phrase: You need to take this medicine twice a day.
prompts.when_to_use: A doctor or pharmacist gives instructions on how to take prescribed medicine.
prompts.prompt: A male nurse handing a small bottle of medicine
prompts.negative_prompt: No multiple patients, no cash registers, no excessive details.

prompts.phrase: Please wait here until the doctor is ready.
prompts.when_to_use: A receptionist or nurse asks a patient to wait for their turn.
prompts.prompt: A male patient sitting on a simple chair in a waiting area, looking at phone.
prompts.negative_prompt: No crowded rooms, no other patients, no hospital beds.

prompts.phrase: We need to take your blood pressure.
prompts.when_to_use: A nurse informs a patient before checking their blood pressure.
prompts.prompt: A male nurse using standing next to an old patient
prompts.negative_prompt: No complex medical devices, no hospital beds, no other staff members.

prompts.phrase: You're going to feel a little pinch.
prompts.when_to_use: A nurse or doctor says this before giving an injection or drawing blood.
prompts.prompt: A male nurse preparing to give an injection
prompts.negative_prompt: No visible blood, no painful expressions, no multiple patients.

prompts.phrase: Your condition is improving, but you still need rest.
prompts.when_to_use: A doctor reassures a recovering patient while advising continued care.
prompts.prompt: A male doctor standing next to a hospital bed, smiling and talking to a male patient.
prompts.negative_prompt: No IV drips, no visitors, no other hospital staff.

prompts.phrase: Please fill out these forms before your appointment.
prompts.when_to_use: A receptionist hands forms to a patient to complete before seeing a doctor.
prompts.prompt: A male receptionist at a front desk
prompts.negative_prompt: No computers, no large stacks of paper, no crowded areas.

prompts.phrase: We'll schedule a follow-up appointment next week.
prompts.when_to_use: A doctor or receptionist arranges a future visit for a patient.
prompts.prompt: A male nurse writing on a computer
prompts.negative_prompt: No digital screens, no crowded spaces, no multiple patients.
